TopicTitle: The one thing the KSC is missing...........

Articles.Content: Well after much thinking, and messing around with unity, i came up with this converted model.
It would also be cool to have non-astronauts like scientists, engineers or people in suits walking around outside. You could send a ship to pick them up and dump them places!

And....

If you tinker a bit with things, Like I frequently do,

http://i1377.photobucket.com/albums/ah65/CorperalVasquez/screenshot304_zps281f57a2.png' alt='screenshot304_zps281f57a2.png'>

You get a whole different vehicle. Introducing the MEDIA TRUCK! Mobile Telemetry Vehicle (M.T.V) Are you tired of missing the launch cycle? perhaps you would like to get that spectacular Explosion on the evening news? Well all you camera shy people This Rig is for you!

Corporal Vasquez

USCSM/KSCSM 8th BMTS Sulaco
